title: Python Interpreter Service Output Schema
description: Schema for the JSON format output of the Python Interpreter service

success.description: Indicates whether the script executed successfully

stdout.description: Standard output captured from the script execution

stderr.description: Standard error output captured from the script execution

error.description: Error message if the script failed, null if successful

traceback.description: Full Python traceback if the script failed (only present on error)

examples.traceback:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
ZeroDivisionError: division by zero
